definition: Unified Payments Interface - India's instant real-time payment system that facilitates inter-bank peer-to-peer and person-to-merchant transactions
Success Rate calculated as the count of successful transactions divided by total transaction count, representing the percentage of UPI transactions that completed successfully
Current day time period used for monitoring and comparison analysis
business_alias: Current Period, Today, Current Day, Today

definition: Previous day time period used as baseline for comparison with current day performance
business_alias: Yday, Yesterday, Yday, Previous Period, T minus 1, Yesterday, T minus 1, Yesterday, Yday, Yesterday, Yesterday, T minus 1, Yesterday, Previous Day

definition: Time-series analysis showing success rate patterns across hourly intervals for performance monitoring
Service Request Monitoring - tracking and analysis of payment service requests and their success/failure rates
Unique identifiers or codes assigned to different banks in the UPI network for transaction routing and identification
Count of failed transactions from yesterday within the same time window as current analysis
Count of failed transactions from today within the current analysis time window
Growth rate of failures calculated as (Today Failure / Yesterday Failure) - 1, with zero handling for cases where yesterday failures are zero
Virtual Payment Address (VPA) identifier of the recipient in UPI transactions, used to route payments to the correct account.
Unique transaction identifier used for counting and tracking individual UPI transactions
Transaction status category that includes both 'SUCCESS' and 'DEEMED' statuses for successful UPI transactions.
Person-to-Person UPI transactions between individual users, including VPA2VPA and VPA2ACCOUNT transfers that are not mandate-based.
business_alias: Person-to-Person, also referred as Peer-to-Peer, Peer-to-Peer, Person-to-Person, Person to Person

definition: Person-to-Merchant collect transactions where merchants initiate payment requests to customers through UPI.
business_alias: Person-to-Merchant Collect, Person to Merchant Collect

definition: Time granularity for data aggregation and trending analysis by hour of the day.
Total count of failed UPI transactions that occurred on the previous date (yesterday), used for day-over-day comparison analysis.
Total count of failed UPI transactions that occurred on the current date, aggregated by error code and payer bank.
NPCI response codes that indicate the reason for UPI transaction failures, used for identifying specific failure patterns.
Time period comparison between current day (T) and previous day (T-1) for trend analysis
business_alias: Today vs T-1, also referred as Today vs Yesterday, Today vs Yesterday

definition: Payment Service Provider - entities that provide UPI payment services to users and merchants
Time period references where T represents current time period and T-1 represents the previous time period for comparison analysis
business_alias: Today vs Yesterday, Current vs Previous Day, Current and Previous Period, Today vs Yesterday, Today & Yesterday, Current vs Previous Period

definition: Classification system for different types of UPI transaction failures, used to categorize and analyze failure patterns.
Total count of failed UPI transactions for the current day (T)
Total count of UPI transactions that failed yesterday (T-1), filtered by specific transaction types and payer handles.
business_alias: T-1 Failure, Yday Failure, total_yest_failures, T-1 Failures, Yday Failure

definition: Day-over-day percentage change in failures, calculated as (Today's Failure / Yesterday's Failure) - 1
The UPI handle or virtual payment address (VPA) of the entity initiating the payment
The bank from which a UPI transaction originates, used as a dimension for analyzing failure patterns.
business_alias: Source bank, Sending bank, Payer Bank Name

definition: Unified Payments Interface Success Rate monitoring dashboard that tracks and compares transaction failure metrics across time periods.
Virtual Payment Address - unique identifier for UPI users
Peer-to-Merchant transactions - payments from individuals to merchant accounts
Count of transactions that completed successfully with status 'SUCCESS' or 'DEEMED'
Total count of all UPI transactions attempted, including both successful and failed transactions
The bank that initiates or sends the UPI payment transaction on behalf of the payer
business_alias: Payer Bank, also referred as Remitter Bank, Remitter Bank, Payer Bank

definition: The financial institution associated with the customer who is making the payment in a UPI transaction
business_alias: Remiter Bank, also referred as Remitter Bank, Payer's Bank

definition: Average count of failed UPI transactions over the last 7 days, calculated by dividing total failures in the 7-day period by 7
Percentage change calculated as (Yesterday's Failures divided by Last 7 Day Average) minus 1, showing how yesterday's failure rate compares to the recent average.
Payer bank names involved in UPI transactions, used to identify bank-specific failure patterns.
Last 7 Days, referring to the 7-day period used for average calculations.
business_alias: Last 7 days, 7-day period, Last7day, Last 7 Day avg, Last 7 Day, Last 7 Day avg, 7-day average, Last 7 Days, Last7day, 7-day period

definition: Scan and Pay transactions - payments made by scanning QR codes including 3P QR and Paytm QR
Online UPI transactions including Intent, P2M Collect, and Mandate_Online flow categories.
On-us UPI transactions including Onus_ExcMandates and Mandate_Onus where both payer and payee are within the same bank.
Average daily count of failed UPI transactions over the last 7 days, calculated by dividing total failures in last 7 days by 7.
business_alias: L7D Avg Failure, 7-day Average Failure, L7D Avg Failure, L7D Failure, 7-day avg failure, L7D Failure

term: Change Yday vs last 7 day avg
definition: Percentage change comparing yesterday's failure count to the average daily failure count over the last 7 days, calculated as (Yesterday's Failures / Last 7 day average) - 1
business_alias: % Change vs L7D avg, T-1 vs L7D Change, Daily Change vs Average

definition: UPI Success Rate monitoring category encompassing metrics related to UPI transaction success and failure rates.
Last 7 Days Average
Yesterday
Error codes returned by NPCI (National Payments Corporation of India) indicating specific reasons for transaction failures
business_alias: Error Code, npci_resp_code, Error Code, NPCI Resp Code

definition: Specific error code categories that are excluded from the analysis
The UPI handle or virtual payment address of the payer initiating the transaction
Response code returned by NPCI (National Payments Corporation of India) indicating transaction status or error reason
Response code returned by NPCI (National Payments Corporation of India) indicating transaction status or failure reason
Status of UPI transactions including SUCCESS and FAILURE states
UPI transactions with status 'FAILURE' indicating unsuccessful payment processing
Unique identifier for each UPI transaction used for counting and tracking purposes
The percentage of transactions that completed successfully out of total transactions attempted
UPI transactions initiated through intent-based payment flows using specific initiation modes
Recurring payment transactions where customers authorize merchants for automatic debits
QR code based transactions processed through Paytm's QR merchant channel
Third-party QR code transactions processed through Paytm channel with specific initiation modes
Total sum of all transactions in the dataset, representing the complete volume of payment attempts.
Count of transactions that completed successfully, filtered to include only transactions with status 'SUCCESS' or 'DEEMED'.
business_alias: Success Transactions, Successful Txns, Successful Transactions

definition: Percentage change in Success Rate compared to the previous time period, calculated using lag function to show period-over-period SR performance.
business_alias: Success Rate Change Percentage, Success Rate Change, SR Delta, Success Rate Change %, SR Change %, SR Change, Success Rate Change, Success Rate Change, SR Change, Success Rate Change, Success Rate Change, SR Change %

definition: Recurring payment transactions set up through UPI mandate system
UPI transaction category where payments are made between two Virtual Payment Addresses (peer-to-peer transfers)
business_alias: VPA to VPA, VPA to VPA, P2P

definition: UPI transaction category where payments are made from Virtual Payment Address to bank account
QR Code payment method, including both Paytm QR and 3P QR (third-party QR) transaction types.
Non-Paytm payment service providers in the UPI ecosystem being compared against Paytm's performance.
Transaction
Current hour success rate calculated as distinct successful transaction count divided by distinct total transaction count for the current monitoring period
Historical average success rate benchmark derived from historical transaction performance data
business_alias: Average Success Rate, Benchmark Success Rate

definition: Variance between current success rate and historical average, calculated as sr_current minus sr_avg to identify performance deviations
UPI transaction category where payments are made from Virtual Payment Address to merchant accounts
Monitoring alert system that tracks UPI success rate performance for the most recent hour compared to historical benchmarks
business_alias: Hourly SR Alert, Real-time SR Monitoring

definition: Current hour's success rate for UPI transactions, calculated by dividing successful transactions by total transactions for the last completed hour
Historical benchmark average success rate used as a baseline for comparison against current performance
Variance calculated as Current SR minus Average SR, indicating performance deviation from historical baseline
Channel Code or business unit identifier used to categorize UPI transactions by source or processing channel
Hourly time dimension extracted from transaction creation timestamp for trend analysis
Count of transactions for the current day (T)
Count of transactions for the previous day (T-1)
Classification codes identifying specific types of transaction failures or errors in UPI transactions
Count of transactions processed on the current day (T)
Count of transactions processed on the previous day (T-1)
Calculated metric comparing failure rates between today and yesterday to identify growth in transaction failures
